comments.raw_text:
I'm trying to renew a contract at https://intranet.mozilla.org/webtools/hiring/contractor and filled in all the fields, hit submit, and just see a big print_r() of my data and no bugs were filed.

I'm not sure who works on the hiring form or I'd CC them.
